name: Khashi Ko Sekuwa
description: Goat Meat roasted in a natural wood fire in a. traditional Nepalese country style.

name: Chicken Sekuwa
description: Chicken Meat roasted in a natural wood fire in a. traditional Nepalese country style.

name: Pork Tareko
description: Chicken marinated meat roasted in a natural wood/log fire in a real traditional Nepalese country style

name: Chicken Chhoila
description: Chicken meat grilled and garnished with spices.

name: Chicken Chilli

name: Khashi Ko Pakku
description: Mutton slow cooked in special designed pot with added flavour of cumin-coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, and other inhouse whole spices and served in earthen pot.
